Spell.Name: Single-Target Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a single-target oriented tower, which allows it to learn Marksman upgrades. Marksman upgrades increase the range of a tower and reduce its attack delay.

Spell.Name: Caster Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a spell oriented tower, which allows it to learn Channeling upgrades. Channeling upgrades increase the spell damage of a tower.

Spell.Name: Splash Tower Flag
Spell.Text: Passive spell. Marks this tower as a splash oriented tower, which allows it to learn Barrage upgrades. Barrage upgrades increase the splash radius and damage of a tower.

Spell.Name: Scatter Shot
Spell.Text: Active spell. This tower fires light projectiles, allowing it to fire twice as fast as it normally would. However, the damage dealt by each projectile is also halved.
Spell.Script: MOD SELF TOWER_DAMAGE_BONUS -50 PERCENT; MOD SELF TOWER_BAT_BONUS -50 PERCENT;

Spell.Name: Snipe
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Snipe spell, which allows this tower to fire projectiles at a much higher velocity. As a result, these projectiles cannot follow creeps but can sometimes pass through a creep that they hit, inflicting damage to any creeps behind it as well. Replaces Scatter Shot. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +100% move speed, 25% chance 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +250% move speed, 50% chance 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +500% move speed, 75% chance 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +1000% move speed, 100% chance

Spell.Name: Reload
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Reload spell, which instantly reloads this tower's weapons when they fire. This effectively allows it to fire twice on its next attack, but can only occur every few seconds. Passive spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 5 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 4 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 3 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Tweak Weapon
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Tweak Weapon spell, which temporarily removes all safety and control measures from this tower. As a result, this tower attacks 10x faster than it normally would for a short amount of time. 1 minute cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 5 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 8 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Fluidity
Spell.Text: Active spell. The fluid nature of this tower causes it to gain a random bonus to damage between -25% and +50% whenever it fires. This bonus is not cumulative.

Spell.Name: Inkpool
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Inkpool spell, which allows this tower to fire large blots of ink that stick to the page when they explode. Creeps that walk over them take (0.35x) + bonus damage every second, but suffer less damage as the blots fade. Each blot lasts for 2 seconds. Replaces Fluidity. Active spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 2&cff000000 - +379 damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - +762 damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - +1590 damage/sec. 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - +3395 damage/sec.

Spell.Name: Overflow
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Overflow spell, which floods the area surrounding this tower with sticky ink. While active, this spell creates an Inkpool every 0.1 seconds on a nearby location, but also prevents this tower from firing. The level of Inkpool created is dependent on the level of Overflow. 30 second cooldown. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv3 used, 10 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv4 used, 12 sec. duration 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - Inkpool Lv5 used, 15 sec. duration

Spell.Name: Overflow
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Floods the surrounding page in ink, creating an Inkpool Lv3 around this tower every 0.1 seconds for 10 seconds. During that time, this tower is unable to fire. 30 second cooldown.
Spell.Script: APPLY_SPELL 80 SELF SELF; MAKE GAME_OBJECT 5 (GET POSITION SELF) SELF;

Spell.Name: Banish
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Banish spell, which instantly removes a single creep from the game. Creeps removed by this effect do not grant any ink or score. Triggered spell.
 
&cffff0000Level 3&cff000000 - 30 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 20 sec. cooldown 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 10 sec. cooldown

Spell.Name: Repel
Spell.Text:
Grants this tower the Repel spell, which pushes nearby creeps within 128px away from this tower. This spell can push creeps past towers, but cannot push creeps into unreachable locations. Triggered spell. 1 min. cooldown.
 
&cffff0000Level 4&cff000000 - 128px distance 
&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 256px distance

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Grants this tower the Singularity spell, which unleashes a vortex at the targeted location that draws in all creeps on the page. The vortex cannot be created on any unreachable location. Triggered spell.\n \n&cffff0000Level 5&cff000000 - 1 charge

Spell.Name: Singularity
Spell.Text: Triggered spell. Unleashes a vortex that draws in all creeps on the page to the targeted location. This location cannot be unreachable to normal creeps.
